provisions.title: Section 13
provisions.content:
13. It shall be lawful for any constable, upon view of Arrestof
any cruelty for which a person is liable to punishment
under this Act, or upon information of any other person,
who states that he has seen such cruelty, and who shall
give his name and place of abode, to arrest the offender
without warrant, if he does not know, or is unable there-
upon to ascertain the name and address of such offender.
